translations: 把……列入计划；为……制定时间表（schedule 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: "S" is that you can have the "scheduling".
sentences.translation: “S”意味着你可以拥有“日程安排”。

sentences.sentence: Newport also recommends "deep scheduling" to combat interruptions and get more done in less time.
sentences.translation: 纽波特还建议通过“深度调度”来对抗干扰，以更少的时间完成更多的工作。

sentences.sentence: This is an extreme example again, but it shows that the scheduling overhead of contention is not trivial.
sentences.translation: 这又是一个极端的示例，但它表明争论的调度开销并不是微不足道的。
